sn46.28:1.8: Evam vutte, ayasma udayi bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn46.28:1.9: “katham bhavita nu kho, bhante, satta bojjhanga katham bahulikata nibbedhaya samvattanti”ti?
sn46.28:2.1: “Idha, udayi, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim vipulam mahaggatam appamanam abyapajjam.
sn46.28:2.2: So satisambojjhangam bhavitena cittena anibbiddhapubbam appadalitapubbam lobhakkhandham nibbijjhati padaleti;
sn46.28:2.5: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim vipulam mahaggatam appamanam abyapajjam.
sn46.28:2.6: So upekkhasambojjhangam bhavitena cittena anibbiddhapubbam appadalitapubbam lobhakkhandham nibbijjhati padaleti;
sn46.28:2.9: Evam bhavita kho, udayi, satta bojjhanga evam bahulikata nibbedhaya samvattanti”ti.
